column2: @CityofJoburgZA @LetscareSA @HermanMashaba I would like to offer my free service in terms of investigating all the irregularities on the housing audit Mr Mashaba please revert back to us who wants to volunteer. Thank you.

column3: Our Global Village volunteer trips offer more than just the opportunity to swing a hammer. You can experience another culture and live like a local while you help communities that need safe, affordable housing. Learn about an upcoming trip to the Philippines. #TravelTuesday
